name: Untitled Jumping Game (kipahlord13, MouseAnon)
description:
A final project for the class MAAD 17887 The Platformer: History and Theory of Videogame Genre in Winter 2022. Taught by Chris Carloy. 

This game explores multiple different jump paradigms across the platformer genre, attempting to explore what affordances and limitations each offers.

Arrow keys or WASD to move, space to jump. Note that directional down allows you to fast fall -- this is necessary at times. Controllers should be fully supported, tested with a wired XBox One controller.
